channel.title: Admin Help..?
channel.description:
ok so im using silabsoft and i have downloaded some rs2(317) sources how can i change my status to admin?
if your just gonna call me noob just dont post
if your gonna help plz do i would really appreciate it.

item.title: Admin Help..?
item.dc:creator: @Ziege_Terra_117 Ziege Terra 117
item.description:
@Ziege_Terra_117 wrote:

Some sources you have to go into client.java and search:

start of moderator/admin list

Below that line you will see a lot of things saying players rights, and it will have some other dudes in-game name. Change that to your player name. But I am unsure as to whether capitals matter…

item.title: Admin Help..?
item.dc:creator: @bl00d_filthy bl00d filthy
item.description:
@bl00d_filthy wrote:

Alright just go into one of the source files. Then go into the character folder. Right click on the file which has your character name on it. (It will probably be the only one there). Anyways once you right click it click on “edit”. It’ll open a notepad and you should look for a line that says like playerrights = 0 change that to either 1, 2, or 3.
1 for moderator
2 for administrator
3 for owner

There you go.

Read full topic
